title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
description: We are looking for a powerhouse developer to lead the creation of internal learning tools and client projects. You will be responsible for architecting scalable solutions and mentoring junior developers.
requirements: 5+ years of experience in modern web technologies.
Strong architectural understanding of microservices.
Ability to translate complex business requirements into technical specs.
Passion for teaching and mentoring students.

title: Cybersecurity Expert & Mentor
description: Join us to shape the next generation of security professionals. You will design curriculum and lead intensive bootcamps on ethical hacking and network security.
requirements: CEH or CISSP certification preferred.
Proven track record in VAPT and Network Security.
Excellent communication skills to explain complex concepts to beginners.
Hands-on experience with security auditing tools.

title: DSA & Competitive Programming Lead
description: Are you a 5-star coder on CodeChef or Specialist on Codeforces? We want you to lead our elite batch of competitive programmers.
requirements: High ranking on LeetCode/Codeforces/CodeChef.
Deep understanding of advanced algorithms (DP, Graphs, Trees).
Previous experience in teaching DSA is a huge plus.
Strong problem-solving and debugging skills.

title: Junior UI/UX Designer
description: Help us make technical education beautiful. You will design interfaces for our internal portals and create high-impact branding for student projects.
requirements: Portfolio demonstrating clean, modern UI design.
Understanding of user-centric design principles.
Ability to create wireframes and high-fidelity prototypes.
Basic knowledge of HTML/CSS is a plus.

title: Sales & Marketing Associate
description: Drive the growth of Dominant Mind by connecting with colleges and students across Karnataka. You will be the face of our academy.
requirements: Excellent presentation and persuasion skills.
Willingness to travel for college seminars and fests.
Basic understanding of the engineering education ecosystem.
Proficiency in local languages (Kannada/Hindi).
